Module schach
Package schach.controller.ai

Class BoardValueNode

  • java.lang.Object
    • schach.controller.ai.BoardValueNode
  • public class BoardValueNode
extends java.lang.Object
    Class that serves as a tree structure, where every object of this class is representing the Board after a move and acting as a node in the tree

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      private Board board
      the board this node is representing
      private Move lastMoved
      the move that was run in before, the move of the parent node
      private java.util.List<Move> moves
      List of moves that are possible as a next move
      private int value
      the value that is determined by all the different white vs all the different black pieces currently on the board
      private boolean whitesTurn
      true if the current node is representing a state where the next move will be picked by white, false if its blacks turn

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      BoardValueNode​(Board board, boolean isWhitesTurn, Move lastMoved)
      constructor initializing the fields

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      Move bestValuedMove​(boolean whitesTurn, int maxDepth)
      calls the min-max algorithm on every child and returns the move of the child with the best value
      private int calcBlackValue()
      calculating the value of all currently active black pieces by adding all there single values
      private int calcBoardValue()
      calculates the value of the board by adding the value of all white pieces to the value of all black pieces
      private int calcWhiteValue()
      calculating the value of all currently active white pieces by adding all there single values
      Move getLastMoved()
      getter for the last moved Piece
      private java.util.List<Move> getMoves()
      generates List of currently possible moves
      int getValue()
      getter for the value
      int minmax​(int depth, int newAlpha, int newBeta)
      the min-max algorithm, iterating through the children and returning the max or min value depending wherever its a turn by white or black

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • BoardValueNode

        public BoardValueNode​(Board board,
                      boolean isWhitesTurn,
                      Move lastMoved)
        constructor initializing the fields
        Parameters:
        board - the board the moves will be executed on
        isWhitesTurn - true if its currently whites turn, false if its blacks turn
        lastMoved - the last move, null if there was none

    • Method Detail

      • bestValuedMove

        public Move bestValuedMove​(boolean whitesTurn,
                           int maxDepth)
        calls the min-max algorithm on every child and returns the move of the child with the best value
        Parameters:
        whitesTurn - if caller is white, false if called by black
        maxDepth - the maximum search depth for the min-max algorithm
        Returns:
        the move of the child with the best value

      • minmax

        public int minmax​(int depth,
                  int newAlpha,
                  int newBeta)
        the min-max algorithm, iterating through the children and returning the max or min value depending wherever its a turn by white or black
        Parameters:
        depth - the maximum search depth
        Returns:
        minmax value of the current node

      • getMoves

        private java.util.List<Move> getMoves()
        generates List of currently possible moves
        Returns:
        List of currently possible moves

      • getValue

        public int getValue()
        getter for the value
        Returns:
        the value of the board

        public Move getLastMoved()
        getter for the last moved Piece
        Returns:
        the last moved piece

      • calcBoardValue

        private int calcBoardValue()
        calculates the value of the board by adding the value of all white pieces to the value of all black pieces
        Returns:
        value of the board

      • calcWhiteValue

        private int calcWhiteValue()
        calculating the value of all currently active white pieces by adding all there single values
        Returns:
        value of all currently active white pieces

      • calcBlackValue

        private int calcBlackValue()
        calculating the value of all currently active black pieces by adding all there single values
        Returns:
        value of all currently active black pieces
